name: TakingFrom
description:
TakingFrom is a game made for GamePlusJam2022.

Controls

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Space key or "x" key to jump.

Mouse click or "z" key to throw bread.

"f" key to activate collecting projectiles.

Description

In order to gain scores. The player must eliminate enemies. While collecting projectiles the player cannot take damage. After 2 seconds of collecting projectiles, the player will release the mixed bread and butter to eliminate enemies.
